# Recipe Keeper 

![image alt](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/212642777/540803063-a518e89c-0f3a-438f-b514-f759c8f782bc.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJnaXRodWIuY29tIiwiYXVkIjoicmF3LmdpdGh1YnVzZXJjb250ZW50LmNvbSIsImtleSI6ImtleTUiLCJleHAiOjE3Njk0ODI0NDcsIm5iZiI6MTc2OTQ4MjE0NywicGF0aCI6Ii8yMTI2NDI3NzcvNTQwODAzMDYzLWE1MThlODljLTBmM2EtNDM4Zi1iNTE0LWY3NTljOGY3ODJiYy5wbmc_.WO2wVAdyH1H1i8MCqnJ-D50LBn8s3294SfBkdqW4p_4)

Recipe Keeper is a full-stack CRUD web app for saving your favorite recipes

## tech used
.javaScript
.Node.js
.ejs
.mongoose
.mongoDb
.css
.flexbox
.HTML
